mapper.insert: insert into qboard (id, title, contents) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.select: select prevId from ( select articleId, lag(articleId, 1, -1) over(order by articleId) as prevId FROM qboard ) as prev where articleid = #{articleId};
select nextId from ( select articleId, lead(articleId, 1, -1) over(order by articleId) as nextId FROM qboard ) as next where articleid = #{articleId};
mapper.insert: insert into comments (qboard_articleId, user_id, contents) values (#{articleId}, #{id}, #{contents})
